summary.rootCause: Implementation didn't follow technical design specifications
summary.solution: Updated to use correct /admin/metrics and /estimations endpoints

changesImplemented.change: Updated to call getAdminMetrics() and getEstimations() instead of getDashboardStats()
changesImplemented.impact: Dashboard now follows technical design specifications

changesImplemented.change: Replaced getDashboardStats() with getAdminMetrics(), updated WORKING_ENDPOINTS array
changesImplemented.impact: API service now matches technical design endpoints

expectedBehavior.dashboardData: Should come from /admin/metrics for system metrics and /estimations for project data
expectedBehavior.apiCalls: Two parallel API calls instead of single dashboard stats call
expectedBehavior.dataMapping: Real API data mapped to dashboard format with proper error handling

nextSteps: Backend needs to implement /admin/metrics endpoint in user-management-service or new admin-service
Backend needs to ensure /estimations endpoint exists with proper CORS headers
Test with real backend implementation once endpoints are available
